name: ColorCurve
description:
'-'-'-'-'-'-'-'CONTROLS'-'-'-'-'-'-'-'

W,A,S,D

'-'-'-'-'-'-'-'COLOR CODES'-'-'-'-'-'-'-'

RED + GREEN = YELLOW

RED + BLUE = MAGENTA

GREEN + BLUE = CYAN

RED/GREEN/BLUE + MAGENTA/YELLOW/CYAN = NOTHİNG

'-'-'-'-'-'-'-'ABOUT GAME'-'-'-'-'-'-'-'

You are a color and your mission is complete the levels. Well how you can complate ?

Simple, If you are controlling a red color you must get in red line. If you are a red and the exist (line) is yellow, you must touch green color for create yellow color

be careful for white color. Couse he is trying catch you
